{"name": " DISH Food Pantry at Bunker Hill Community College ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Grocery orders can be picked up by appointment only.
Grab & Go meals: 11am-3pm in B101, 3-7pm in G-Building Lounge

Open to students and staff of Bunker Hill Community College only.
